price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tó bá tẹ̀lé Òjíṣẹ́ náà, ó ti tẹ̀lé (àṣẹ) Allāhu. Ẹnikẹ́ni tó bá sì pẹ̀yìndà, A kò rán ọ níṣẹ́ olùṣọ́ lórí wọn.
arabic: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدۡ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: man yuṭiʿi al-rasūla faqad aṭāʿa al-laha waman tawallā famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan
